item.title: AoC 2021 Day 03: Binary Diagnostic
item.description: Day 3 - Advent of Code 2021. Eric Wastl. adventofcode.com . Accessed Feb 23, 2022. Problem Description Part One The submarine has been making some odd creaking noises, so you ask it to produce a diagnostic report just in case. The diagnostic report (your puzzle input) consists of a list of binary numbers which, when decoded properly, can tell you many useful things about the conditions of the submarine.
